    • Promotion

      public Promotion​(String name, String desc, float price, String id)
      Creates a table with its table number, seating capacity and availability.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the menu item.
      desc - The description of the menu item.
      price - The price of the menu item of float type.
      id - The unqiue reference string of the menu item.
